org.jgentleframework.configure
Interface SystemConfig

All Known Subinterfaces:
Configurable
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractConfig, RmiService, SystemConfigImpl, WebAbstractConfig
public interface SystemConfig

Provides some system methods in order to execute some system configurations including DefinitionPostProcessor, AnnotationBeanProcessor, ... ComponentServiceContextType and ... others.

Author:
LE QUOC CHUNG - mailto: skydunkpro@yahoo.com
See Also:
AnnotationBeanProcessor, ComponentServiceContextType, DefinitionPostProcessor

addAnnotationBeanProcessor

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> AnnotationBeanProcessor<T> addAnnotationBeanProcessor(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                                  AnnotationBeanProcessor<T> app)
Adds the given AnnotationBeanProcessor

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
clazz - object class represents the corresponding annotation type appropriate to AnnotationBeanProcessor instance.
app - the AnnotationBeanProcessor need to be added.
Returns:
returns the previous AnnotationBeanProcessor instance if it existed, if not, returns null.

addAnnotationBeanProcessor

<T extends java.lang.annotation.Annotation> AnnotationBeanProcessor<T> addAnnotationBeanProcessor(java.lang.Class<T> clazz,
                                                                                                  java.lang.Class<? extends AnnotationBeanProcessor<T>> appClass)
Adds the given AnnotationBeanProcessor

Type Parameters:
T -
Parameters:
clazz - object class represents the corresponding annotation type appropriate to AnnotationBeanProcessor instance.
appClass - The object class type of AnnotationBeanProcessor need to be added. object class của APP chỉ định cần add.
Returns:
returns the previous AnnotationBeanProcessor instance if it existed, if not, returns null.

Note: It will be only effected if the current container is ServiceProvider

cscClass - the object class of ComponentServiceContextType.

setDefinitionManager

void setDefinitionManager(DefinitionManager definitionManager)
Sets the given definition manager to current configurable instance. The invoking of this method will also execute the AnnotationRegister setting to current configurable instance.

Parameters:
definitionManager - the given DefinitionManager need to be setted.
